attributedTo.description: id of the actor that authored this object

attachment.description: A list of objects that are attached to the original object

tag.description: A list of objects that expand on the content of the object

url.description: A list of urls that expand on the content of the object

sensitive.description: Marks the object as sensitive. Currently, used by everyone, a better way would be an element of the tag list that labels the object as sensitive due a reason

inReplyTo.description: The object being replied to. Currently a string. Not sure if this is what I want.
